techmeme.title: A profile of Fei-Fei Li's World Labs, which aims to create "spatial intelligence" in AI and raised $230M from a16z and others, reportedly at a $1B valuation (Steven Levy/Wired)
Sources: Microsoft has pitched its AI to ExxonMobil, Chevron, and others to find and develop oil and gas reserves while publicly committing to reduce emissions (Karen Hao/The Atlantic)
Apple to allow alternative app stores and browser engines on iPads in the EU with iPadOS 18 on September 16, after the EU applied DMA rules on iPadOS in April (Romain Dillet/TechCrunch)
Elon Musk calls Australian government "fascists" after it unveiled a bill to fine online platforms up to 5% of their global revenue for enabling misinformation (Renju Jose/Reuters)
In a provisional ruling, the CMA says Vodafone and Three's planned $19B merger could lead to higher prices, diminished service, and reduced investment in the UK (Paul Sawers/TechCrunch)
